release.description:
# Rabbit and Steel Archipelago v0.1.1
[Release Page](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/releases/tag/release) | [Setup](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago#installation)

Initial release of Rabbit and Steel for Archipelago 🥳 ! This is early alpha and will very likely have random crashes, caution is advised. 

## Here's the list of features:

- Kingdom Sanity
    - Kingdoms must be found before they can be visited
- Max Kingdoms Per Run
    - The number of kingdoms you visit before header to the pale keep
- Progressive Regions
    - How many regions you are currently allowed to visit in a run
    - Includes the Pale Keep and Moonlit Pinnacle, excludes Kingdom Outskirts
 - Kingdom Order
     - Logical order kingdoms are expected to traverse
     - Valid values are 0 to the max kingdoms per run setting (inclusive), where 0 will randomly assign an order prioritizing unfilled orders then highest order on a tie
     - Invalid values will result in the kingdom not being added to the pool and inaccessible.
     - The in game route selection will prioritize following an incremental route order, but if you can visit say 3 kingdoms and only have kingdoms with route orders 1, 1, and 2; you will visit one of the 1s then the 2 and then the last 1 (I think)
     - However, you will also be able to select your first kingdom as long as its logically accessible
         - Do not trust the kingdom you have selected when you join a lobby from the settings screen, if you want a specific kingdom select off it and then back on it
    - Generation will throw an error if there are not enough valid kingdoms or if there isn't at least one kingdom in each order from 1 to max kingdoms per run after the random assignment
- Class Sanity
    - Classes must be found before they can be played
    - A special starting class item will be added to the lobby screen that gives you a random starting class
        - Sometimes the items don't send, please try leaving the lobby and rejoining as its usually worked for me second time
- Checks Per Class
    - Classes that have locations associated with them
    - The generic location will still exist, and any class can obtain them
    - The values should start with a capital letter like Heavyblade
- Shuffle Item Sets
    - Item sets must be found before they can appear in a non archipelago treasuresphere
- Checks Per Item In Chest
    - Each item in an archipelago treasuresphere is an archipelago item
    - Shuffles 5 non archipelago treasurespheres into the item pool
        - When you receive a treasuresphere it should appear as the next 'encounter'
        - When you start a new run, you should start with all the treasurespheres you've unlocked
    - Does not add a check per item if Checks Per Class is on
- Upgrade Sanity
    - Determines what is required for an upgrade to appear in a shop
    - Upgrade will be randomly chosen from the available options
    - None: All upgrades are available from the start
    - Simple: Just need to get the type of upgrade to unlock them for all attacks, i.e. Ruby Upgrade unlocks Ruby Primary, Ruby Secondary, etc..
    - Full: Need to get Ruby Primary Upgrade to unlock that primary upgrade
- Potion Sanity
    - How the top shelf of the shop appears
    - None: Default behavior
    - Locked: HP and level up will always be in their position, once their item is found, and the 3 potions will be randomly selected from the pool of obtained potions
    - Roulette: Any item on the top shelf can appear in any position
        - Slots continue to have their original behavior, you can only buy the item in the HP slot if your not at full health, can buy level up slot infinitely, and buy each potion slot once
- Shop Sanity
    - Shops contain AP items to purchase, and the AP item is required to purchase before you can purchase the normal shop item for that slot
    - None: Shops do not carry any AP items
    - Global: Shops carry the same AP items, and only need to be purchased once to unblock the slot
    - Regional: Each kingdom contains their own AP items that need to be purchased
- Goal Condition
    - Currently only have a goal to defeat Shira x number of times with unique classes
- Shira Defeats
    - If goal is set to Shira, determines how many unique classes must defeat Shira to goal

## Misc

- Multiplayer is not currently supported, it might work but I haven't tested it
- Buying a shop AP item currently refreshes the entire store selection
- AP items in the shop don't actually cost anything currently
- I haven't tested receiving a treasuresphere with itemset shuffle on, but receiving no itemsets
- When going through the treasurespheres at the start of a new run, the adventure hasn't 'started' so players can still join as if it was the preparing screen
- Don't modify the lobby settings while inside the lobby, I don't think it would break anything but I also don't think it would fix anything your trying to fix
- If your screen is frozen, make sure you don't have any selected text on the Reloaded 2 console
    - You can fix it by right clicking anywhere on the console
- The gold item doesn't do anything currently
release.title: Alpha v0.1.1

v0.1.2-fix.description:
Added a fix for not being able to find reloaded's directory and a manual way to bypass that if the fix still doesn't work. Note the new section in [Configuration](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/releases/tag/v0.1.2-fix) for these fixes

v0.2.0.description:
# Contains an update to the APWorld

- Added an option to enforce kingdom order when kingdom sanity is on, kingdom order will always apply if kingdom sanity is off but progressive regions is on
- Separated the ability to exclude kingdoms from kingdom order, in game log will show excluded order as -1 but please dont set the order to -1 yourself
- fixed bug where chest contents displayed the same image
- renamed reloaded's item folder to ArchipelagoItems to be consistent with what the steam version wants
- Added more logging

v0.2.3-fix.description:
Added a button to reconnect to the multiworld if you get disconnected, and while disconnected you should not be able to proceed to the next room. It tries to connect for up to 4 seconds, but it should only take the full 4 seconds if the reconnect fails.

Also added to the mod config two fields for archipelago name and address. these should automatically prefill the settings with these values, and if you change the values in the setting it should automatically update the config values

v0.2.4.description:
Moved the starting class to starting inventory, so you should no longer randomly need to restart the lobby to receive it

Pale Keep and Moonlit Pinnacle now cares about your progressive regions

Hopefully made the random crash consistently happen only when receiving messages or when moving to the next room

And hopefully fixed GetOptions null reference

v0.2.7.description:
Unlocks all character types and difficulties when playing in AP lobby
Fixed in game messaging causing crashes
Removed ready check while disconnected and send the location on room change as backup

Merged misc code cleanup PRs by @s5bug

# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)

## [v0.2.7](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/compare/v0.2.6...v0.2.7) - 2026-01-26

### Merged

- Change DataStateKey to a record + a bit of a refactor of SharedData [`#5`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/pull/5)
- fix typos in CSVs and fix spelling of Receive in various places [`#3`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/pull/3)

### Commits

- Unlock difficulties and classes on AP start [`00be779`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/commit/00be779b2f5c810cee57059aba3e2e92fa03cd6e)
- Moved execute function to the game thread [`7b7f6bc`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/commit/7b7f6bc7810a09ae844326701b4510cbf1efbc60)

v0.2.8.description:
Fixed sending locations upon entering a new kingdom
Made compatible with rnsReloaded v 1.1.16+ and rns extra mode (dlc)

Merged non-static refactor PR by @s5bug

# Changelog

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [v0.2.8](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/compare/v0.2.7...v0.2.8) - 2026-02-12

### Merged

- No `static` refactor [`#7`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/pull/7)

### Commits

- Fixed sending location on entering kingdom [`e6da1ee`](https://github.com/tjwombo/RNSArchipelago/commit/e6da1ee63cb722b94c60cbc0f9e2ffb13b9da086)

v0.2.8.title: v0.2.8

v0.2.9-fix.description:
Fixes most of the bugs I'm aware of
- Ids updated for dlc, this should fix wrong items appearing in normal chests and shops, and should fix the chest crash (never verified this, was just a hunch)
- Shop sanity shouldn't crash anymore
- Connecting to lobby without a server open / bad ip shouldn't crash anymore
- Treasurespheres shouldn't make default windows error noise
- Pause menu connection sprites updated with the new ids
